caioniumz.name: Caionium Z
caioniumz.desc: If held by an Aurorus with Blizzard, it can use Blistering Ice Age.

quagniumz.name: Quagnium Z
quagniumz.desc: If held by a Quagsire with Scorching Sands, it can use Bounty Place.

sodapop.name: Soda Pop
sodapop.desc: If held by a Riolu with Fake Out, it can use Satanic Panic.

kalalokkiumz.name: Kalalokkium Z
kalalokkiumz.desc: If held by a Wingull with Blackbird, it can use Gaelstrom.

modium6z.name: Modium-6 Z
modium6z.desc: If held by a Robb576 with Photon Geyser, it can use Integer Overflow.
